member.name: CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT
member.summary: The CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT structure contains information about the kinds of certificates listed in a certificate revocation list (CRL).

member.name: CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT.fOnlyContainsUserCerts
member.summary: BOOL flag. TRUE if only user certificates are contained in the CRL.

member.name: CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT.fOnlyContainsCACerts
member.summary: BOOL flag. TRUE if only CA certificates are contained in the CRL.

member.name: CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT.OnlySomeReasonFlags
member.summary: Optional with bits indicating some reasons for certificate revocation.

member.name: CRL_ISSUING_DIST_POINT.fIndirectCRL
member.summary: BOOL flag. TRUE if this is an indirect CRL.
